Preview Code import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { LineChart, Line, BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; import { Leaf, Users, Scale } from 'lucide-react'; const mockEnvData = [ { month: 'Jan', carbonEmissions: 150, waterUsage: 200, wasteReduction: 45 }, { month: 'Feb', carbonEmissions: 140, waterUsage: 180, wasteReduction: 50 }, { month: 'Mar', carbonEmissions: 130, waterUsage: 190, wasteReduction: 55 } ]; const mockSocialData = [ { month: 'Jan', employeeSatisfaction: 75, diversityScore: 68, communityImpact: 82 }, { month: 'Feb', employeeSatisfaction: 78, diversityScore: 70, communityImpact: 85 }, { month: 'Mar', employeeSatisfaction: 80, diversityScore: 72, communityImpact: 87 } ]; const mockGovData = [ { month: 'Jan', complianceScore: 90, boardDiversity: 65, riskManagement: 85 }, { month: 'Feb', complianceScore: 92, boardDiversity: 68, riskManagement: 87 }, { month: 'Mar', complianceScore: 95, boardDiversity: 70, riskManagement: 89 } ]; const ESGDashboard = () => { return (
{/* Environmental Section */}

Environmental Metrics

Carbon Emissions Water Usage Waste Reduction
{/* Social Section */}

Social Metrics

Employee Satisfaction Diversity Score Community Impact
{/* Governance Section */}

Governance Metrics

Compliance Score Board Diversity Risk Management
); }; export default ESGDashboard;
